Lucio.name: Soundwave
Lucio.description: Deal 112 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

Lucio.name: Crossfade
Lucio.description: Play one of two music tracks for Lucio and his allies. Healing Boost: Passively heal Lucio and nearby allied Heroes for 16 health per second. Speed Boost: Increase the Movement Speed of Lucio and nearby allied Heroes by 15%.

Lucio.name: Amp It Up
Lucio.description: Raise Lucio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 128 (+4% per level) health per second and Speed Boost to 45% increased Movement Speed.

Lucio.name: Sound Barrier
Lucio.description: After a 1 second delay, grant yourself and all nearby allied Heroes a 1392 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

Lucio.name: Reverse Amp
Lucio.description: Blast Lucio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%. Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

Lucio.name: Wall Ride
Lucio.description: When moving alongside impassable terrain, Lucio can walk through other units, and his Movement Speed is increased by 20%. This works together with other Movement Speed bonuses.

1.name: Accelerando
1.description: Increase the Movement Speed bonus of Wall Ride from 20% to 40% over 4 seconds, and maintain that speed as long as you maintain the Wall Riding movement speed bonus.

1.name: Maximum Tempo
1.description: Quest: Kill 5 enemy Heroes while Speed Boost is active. Reward: Increase Amped Speed Boost to 60%.

1.name: Slip
1.description: Increase the Movement Speed bonus of Wall Ride to 70% for 1 second when near or passing through an enemy Hero.

1.name: We Move Together
1.description: Increase the passive movement speed bonus of Speed Boost to 20% (from 15%).

4.name: Chase the Bass
4.description: Quest: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes with Soundwave, increase the arc by 50% and the range by 20%.

4.name: Off the Wall
4.description: If you hit an enemy Hero while you have the Wall Riding Movement Speed bonus, reduce the cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: Subwoofer
4.description: Increase the knockback of Soundwave by up to 50%, based on how close to you they are.

7.name: Boombox
7.description: Place a killable ward on the ground that gives nearby allies your Crossfade and Amp It Up auras (auras do not stack). Lasts 30 seconds. Max 1.

7.name: Party Mix
7.description: Quest: Support allies with your aura for a total of 8 minutes (supporting multiple allies rewards more time). Reward: Increase its radius by 20%.

7.name: Sonic Amplifier
7.description: If your aura is currently affecting 2 or more allies when you cast Amp It Up, increase its radius by 50% for the duration.

10.name: Reverse Amp
10.description: Blast Lucio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%. Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

10.name: Sound Barrier
10.description: After a 1 second delay, grant yourself and all nearby allied Heroes a 1392 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

13.name: Back in the Mix
13.description: Heal for 260 (+4% per level) upon entering a Stun, Silence, or Time Stop effect. This cannot happen more than once every 10 seconds.

13.name: Beat Mixing
13.description: After switching Crossfade tracks, if the next song plays for at least 1.5 seconds, Lucio gains a 100 (+4% per level) point Shield that last indefinitely. Switching tacks again removes the Shield.

13.name: Can't Stop, Won't Stop
13.description: You cannot be slowed or rooted while you have the Wall Riding Movement Speed bonus.

13.name: Hard Style
13.description: Gain 25 Armor while you have the Wall Riding movement speed boost, reducing damage by 25%.

16.name: Bring it Together
16.description: If your aura is currently affecting 2 or more allies when you cast Amp It Up, Crossfade's Healing Boost is increased by 45% for the duration.

16.name: Rejuvenescencia
16.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 3% of the target's maximum health per second.

16.name: Up the Frequency
16.description: Amp It Up's mana cost is reduced to 80 from 100, and dealing Basic Attack damage to enemy Heroes reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.45 seconds.

20.name: Bonus Track
20.description: Using Crossfade while Amp It Up is active resets the duration of Amp It Up back to its max duration. This can only occur once per cast.

20.name: Bossa Nova
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the shield now decays over 4 seconds (from 6).

20.name: Nonstop Remix
20.description: The duration of Reverse Amp is paused while it effects 2 or more enemy Heroes.

20.name: Synaesthesia Auditiva
20.description: Casting Amp It Up removes all Stun, Slow, and Root effects from nearby allies, and all Slow and Root effects on Lucio.
